attributes.action: Free Movement  into the UK for nationals of Austrialia, New Zealand and Canada
attributes.additional_details: Many people in Austrialia New Zealand and Canada have close family and community ties with the UK. We share the same Monarch and language.. We have along history of partnership and common values. Progress on the free movement of people within these Commonwealth areas would be benificial to buisness industry education and community.
attributes.background: The UK recently voted in a referendum to leave the European Union this will result in a reduction in immigration. With closer ties to the main ex commonwealth dominions fluctuations in employment and services good be more easily managed.
